about_the_game:
Crimson Lust is an immersive adult game set in a gothic mansion, blending exploration, seduction, and detailed interactions. As the protagonist, you are free to roam through various rooms and hidden passages in a mysterious house, filled with objects and secrets waiting to be uncovered.

Key Features:

  • Interactive Exploration: Navigate through a beautifully designed gothic mansion, where each room offers new objects and interactions. From intimate bedrooms to dark, hidden corners, the environment is rich with detail and secrets.

  • Libidinous Interactions: Unlock and engage in intimate, detailed animations with various items scattered throughout the house. Items like dildos, vibrators, and other stimulating objects will allow you to trigger personalized and seductive scenes.

  • Multiple Animations and Scenes: Each object you interact with comes with unique animations. These animations are rendered in high-quality detail, providing an immersive and visually rich experience for the player.

  • Gothic Atmosphere: Experience a haunting yet seductive gothic aesthetic, with dimly lit hallways, dark wood furniture, and a soundtrack that complements the mysterious mood of the mansion.

  • Freedom of Choice: Explore at your own pace, unlocking new interactions as you uncover hidden rooms and discover more about the protagonist's desires.

Crimson Lust offers a blend of interactive storytelling, rich visual design, and a focus on intimate adult content, creating an engaging experience for players looking for both adventure and desire.

content_descriptors.notes:
Crimson Lust is a game intended for adults only and is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: 
nudity, explicit sexual content

name: Crimson Lust

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 4 GHz Dual Core or better
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Explore a gothic mansion full of hidden mysteries and desires. In Crimson Lust, you control a seductive protagonist who uncovers libidinous secrets in an environment rich with provocative interactions.
